name: bulma-stylus
author: Oskari Groenroos <oskari@groenroos.fi> (http://groenroos.fi)
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.build: npm run build-stylus && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss
scripts.build-autoprefix: postcss --use autoprefixer --map false --output css/bulma.css css/bulma.css && stylelint css/bulma.css --fix -q
scripts.rtl: npm run rtl-stylus && npm run rtl-autoprefix && npm run rtl-cleancss
scripts.rtl-autoprefix: postcss --use autoprefixer --map false --output css/bulma-rtl.css css/bulma-rtl.css && stylelint css/bulma-rtl.css --fix -q
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run rtl
